author: John Brandon
title: VR is the future of remote working
description: Video conferencing offers benefits for remote working, but remains limited in terms of interactions. Virtual Reality could make the whole experience more engaging and productive.
content:
Lets set the record straight on remote work right now. Zoom and Skype wont quite work for the long haul. While they are ideal for video chats, when a bunch of talking heads all join together in a virtual environment the interaction is limited.
